summary: Provides a Subscription class that encapsulates an asynchronous WebSocket connection to the Prefect API, allowing callers to iterate over streamed data items in an async for loop while automatically handling connection lifecycle, reconnection, and error handling.
business_intent: Enable Prefect clients to receive real-time updates (e.g., flow run events, logs) from the Prefect server, supporting event-driven automation and monitoring within user applications.
